translations.chinese: 榮與越將軍印，因令反梁地。
translations.english: Tian Rong gave the general's seal to the Yue general and ordered him to rebel in Liang territory.

translations.chinese: 越擊殺濟北王安，榮遂并三齊之地。
translations.english: Yue attacked and killed King Jibei Tian An. Tian Rong then united the three Qi territories.

translations.chinese: 燕王韓廣亦不肯徙遼東。
translations.english: King Yan Han Guang also refused to move to Liaodong.

translations.chinese: 秋八月，臧荼殺韓廣，并其 地。
translations.english: In the eighth month of autumn, Zang Tu killed Han Guang and took his territory.
King Sai Xin and King Di Yi both surrendered to Han.
